title: Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, purple and black applied by pen and brush, then immersion dyed in madder. 2 shades of blue. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 88 x 72 cm (34 5/8 x 28 3/8 in.)
description: Curving floral stripes of carnations and roses in an alternate arrangement of motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, purple and black applied by pen and brush, then immersion dyed in madder. 2 shades of blue. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-27.
